pages.text: The foundry will help you smelt ore. It is very important early game. It requires a stone crucible, a stone casting vessel, and a furnace. Required: 14 cobblestone, 3 cobblestone slabs, 2 sand, and 2 clay blocks.
Make sure to have lots of coal.

First you put in a fuel source (recommended: coal or charcoal), then you wait until it heats up and put in your ores. You can melt as many as you want at a time, but be careful! It will waste ores if you overflow it.
